name: Night of the Living Stuffies
description:
My first Unity project (part of a one term school project).  

Stuffed animals have come to life and are harassing you and your family.  You must avoid being touched by the stuffed animals to survive.  Lucky for you, the stuffed animals have a weakness:  light.  Use your handy flashlight to shine light in their eyes to momentarily disarm them.  But beware.  They will only be disarmed shortly, and your flashlight battery does not last forever.  You may need to locate batteries to keep your flashlight alive.  Find your sister and escape to win the game. 

Use the keyboard arrow keys to move and the mouse to look around.
